Cell.Data: 40mm Fragmentation Grenade: The 40mm Fragmentation Grenade is an anti-structure grenade that inflicts quadruple damage to structures and also sprays shrapnel in a small radius around its detonation point. This shrapnel has poor armour penetration but can kill or injure multiple enemy units at the same time if they are standing too close to one another. It must be launched by grenade launcher.

40mm Alenium Grenade: The 40mm Alenium Grenade is an anti-structure grenade that inflicts quadruple damage to structures and also sprays shrapnel in a small radius around its detonation point. This shrapnel has poor armour penetration but can kill or injure multiple enemy units at the same time if they are standing too close to one another. It must be launched by grenade launcher.

40mm Plasma Grenade: The 40mm Plasma Grenade is an anti-structure grenade that inflicts quadruple damage to structures and also sprays shrapnel in a small radius around its detonation point. This shrapnel has poor armour penetration but can kill or injure multiple enemy units at the same time if they are standing too close to one another. It must be launched by grenade launcher.

40mm Fusion Grenade: The 40mm Fusion Grenade is an anti-structure grenade that inflicts quadruple damage to structures and also sprays shrapnel in a small radius around its detonation point. This shrapnel has poor armour penetration but can kill or injure multiple enemy units at the same time if they are standing too close to one another. It must be launched by grenade launcher.

40mm Incendiary Grenade: The 40mm Incendiary Grenade is a grenade that inflicts fires in a small radius around its detonation point. The explosion has poor armour penetration but can kill or injure multiple enemy units at the same time if they are standing too close to one another. It must be launched by grenade launcher.

40mm Stun Gas Grenade: The 40mm Stun Grenade is a method of delivering stun gas into an area from long range. This gas inflicts stun damage on any unit that comes in contact with it each turn - though some alien units (particularly those with helmets) are partially or fully resistant to this effect. It must be launched by grenade launcher.

40mm Electroshock Grenade: The 40mm Electroshock Grenade produce a powerful electrical pulse that inflicts stun damage on biological units and EMP damage on robotic units. It must be launched by grenade launcher.

40mm Flare: The 40mm Flare is a grenade designed to illuminate a wide area without causing any damage. It is heavier than hand thrown flare and thus limited in supply, but can light up a much wider area and can be launcher further. It must be launched by grenade launcher.

40mm Smoke Grenade: The 40mm Smoke Grenade does not cause damage, instead generating a cloud of thick smoke within its blast radius. This smoke significantly reduces the accuracy of any shots fired through it, offering protection from incoming alien fire. It must be launched by grenade launcher.
Grenade Launcher: Experimental implementation. Use rocket as ammo.
